title: Women Cheat With Their Heart, Men Cheat With Their... #shorts
description:
Ready to build a network of amazing women and high-status men?

Michael’s Men of Action is a one-on-one Master’s program that teaches men how to create elite social lives by becoming higher status.

Click this link to learn how you can have a High-Status lifestyle now:
https://m.moamentoring.com/podcast

Click here to join the Men of Action community and watch the High-Status Networking 101 course:
https://m.moamentoring.com/moa-community

When women cheat, men ask, did you f**k him? And that tends to, by the way, here's a funny thing. When homosexual men cheat, homosexual men ask, did you f**k him also? And when lesbian women cheat, lesbian women ask, do you love her? So it has, it goes across sexual preferences as far as the way men and women are set up, because men have 11 or 17 times as much testosterone as women do. And that's the reason why the sexual proclivity is so different. Men don't need to be comfortable to have sex with women. A really attractive woman comes up to a man to have sex. He's just going to be like, yes, yeah, this is my job. I'm supposed to do this. This is my job. I'm on earth for this. I'm on earth for this. I don't have any other choice. I have to do this now. Whereas a woman, a woman, it's really interesting. So if a man has a long term partner, he will choose short term sexual partners in some cases that are below his long term partner. Women are the opposite. Women generally, when they can choose a short term sexual partner, they're picking Brad Pitt. Right. They're picking way better looking. Exactly.
